title: Bug 11863 - Update Test Suite action does not allow removal
OB: When selecting 'Y' in the dialog for the Update Test Suite action, it is not clear that this will result in the removal of X. The behavior should be improved to clearly indicate that selecting 'Y' will remove X.
EB: The 'Update' action should display the content of the existing Test Suite (directory, zip file) and allow modifications. Renaming the action and the dialog to 'Recreate Test Suite' would provide a clearer solution to the problem.
SR: Improve the behavior of the Update Test Suite action to clearly indicate that selecting 'Y' will remove X. Rename the action and the dialog to 'Recreate Test Suite'.
